alert.delete.entity.title: Deletion warning
alert.links.loop.title: Link loop error
alert.links.loop.content:
You cannot link the selected tasks because it will create a loop between them.
Please review the existing links or change the selection.

alert.links.subitems.content: You cannot link tasks belonging to sub-projects.

alert.links.external.items.content: You cannot link tasks belonging to external projects.
alert.links.different.projects.items.con: You cannot link tasks belonging to different projects.
alert.outdent.warning.title: Outdent warning
alert.outdent.warning.message: You cannot outdent this item because
alert.outdent.warning.message.resources: there is one or more assignments on it
alert.outdent.warning.message.links: it is linked to at least one another item
alert.outdent.warning.message.subItemHas: it is a sub-entity and cannot became a phase
alert.outdent.warning.message.parentCont: Its parent contains documents not coming from Genius Planner and cannot be transformed to task.
alert.indent.warning.title: Indent warning
alert.indent.warning.message: You cannot indent this item because the expected new parent
alert.indent.warning.message.multiple: You cannot indent these items because the expected new parent
alert.indent.warning.message.links: is linked to at least one another item
alert.backend.saving.title: Saving...
alert.backend.failed: Server failed. Please contact your Administrator.

alert.backend.success.title: Saved

alert.insert.external.entity.body:
The selected item is already in the plan.

alert.insert.subproject.entity.body.head: The selected sub-project has already inserted item (s):

alert.insert.template.entity.body.header: The selected template has already inserted item (s):
alert.insert.template.entity.body.footer: Please remove them before importing the template or select another template.
